notes.title: Data Availability
notes.p: The datasets for analysis are available, respectively, at https://climatedataguide.ucar.edu/climate-data/merged-hadley-noaaoi-sea-surface-temperature-sea-ice-concentration-hurrell-et-al-2008 for the observed SST, 10.5067/2E096JV59PK7 for the MERRAâ€“2 atmospheric variables, and https://cds.nccs.nasa.gov/odas for OHC.
